title: Can someone translate this from Punjabi to English? Rabba ik vaari yaar mila de, Pher bhavein jaan le lavi? - Quora

response.answer_text: “RABBA (God) IK VAARI (once)YAAR ( sweetheart/close friend/soulmate/beloved) MILA DE(let me see/meet) , PHER (then/thence) CHAVAIN (if one wants) JAAN (life) LE LAVI (take away)” =============English translation :- “OH GOD ! LET ME SEE/ meet MY SWEETHEART (close friend/ soulmate /beloved ) ONCE; THEN, IF YOU WANT (you can) TAKE MY LIFE”
